definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: vigour, wealth—abs. Ho 12:9, sf. [[אוֹנִי]] Ge 49:3 + etc.; pl. [[אוֹנִים]] Ps 78:51 +.

manly vigour [[בְּאוֹנוֹ שָׂרָה אֶת־אֱלֽהִים]] Ho 12:4 (of Jacob); [[רֵאשִׁית אוֹן]] beginning of manly vigour Ge 49:3 (of Reuben, first-born of Jacob); De 21:17, Ps 105:36 (firstborn Egyptians), so Ps 78:51, [[רֵאשִׁית אוֹנִים]] where ´[[א]] is assim. to [[מִחְרַיִם]], or intens. pl.

strength of man Job 18:7, Job 18:12; behemoth Job 40:16; pl. intens. [[מֵרׂב אוֹנִים]] Is 40:26 because of the abundance of great strength (of God); of man [[אֵין אוֹנִים]] Is 40:29 one not having strength; [[תּוֹחֶלֶת אוֹנִים]] Pr 11:7 hope in strength (not the hope of iniquity RV, or of unjust men AV).
